content.rendered:
Where memories are made.
Embark on unforgettable journeys with Lishika Holidays.
Enquire Now
Let Lishika Holidays be your guide.
Explore the world with confidence.
Enquire Now
Previous
Next
We promise unforgettable experiences

Our Packages

With flexible customization and competitive pricing, our packages ensure that every traveller can find the perfect itinerary to suit their budget and interests.

1 Day

    Pre Sales Request

    Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

    1 Day Mysore Tour

    Mysore

    Embark on a captivating journey through Mysore's rich history and cultural heritage with our one-day tour. Explore iconic landmarks, immerse yourself in vibrant markets, and savour the flavours of local cuisine on this unforgettable adventure.

    Terms & Conditions Apply*

    Details
    From

    5500 ₹

    2 Days

      Pre Sales Request

      Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

      2 Days Bangalore to Chikmagalur Tour

      Chikmagalur

      Escape to the serene landscapes of Chikmagalur on our two-day tour from Bangalore. Immerse yourself in nature's beauty, indulge in adventure activities, and unwind in comfortable accommodations amidst lush surroundings for a truly rejuvenating getaway.

      Terms & Conditions Apply*

      Details
      From

      16500 ₹

      2 Days

        Pre Sales Request

        Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

        2 Days Bangalore to Coorg Tour

        Coorg

        Embark on a scenic journey from Bangalore to Coorg for a two-day adventure filled with natural wonders and cultural delights. Explore verdant coffee plantations, visit cascading waterfalls, and experience the charm of Coorg's hill station lifestyle while enjoying comfortable accommodations for a memorable retreat.

        Terms & Conditions Apply*

        Details
        From

        16500 ₹

        2 Days

          Pre Sales Request

          Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

          2 Days Bangalore to Ooty Tour

          Ooty

          ​​Join us on a two-day journey from Bangalore to Ooty, where you'll discover the beauty of the Nilgiris. Experience the tranquillity of lush tea estates, marvel at breathtaking viewpoints, and immerse yourself in the charm of Ooty's colonial heritage. With comfortable accommodations included, this tour promises a refreshing escape into the lap of nature.

          Terms & Conditions Apply*

          Details
          From

          17000 ₹

          3 Days

            Pre Sales Request

            Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

            3 days Bangalore to Mysore and Coorg Tour

            Mysore and Coorg

            Experience the best of Karnataka's cultural and natural treasures on our three-day tour from Bangalore to Mysore and Coorg. Explore the royal heritage of Mysore, including its magnificent palaces and vibrant markets, before immersing yourself in the serene landscapes of Coorg. From lush coffee plantations to cascading waterfalls, this tour offers a perfect blend of history, culture, and nature. With comfortable accommodations included, get ready for an unforgettable journey through the heart of South India.

            Terms & Conditions Apply*

            Details
            From

            21000 ₹

            3 Days

              Pre Sales Request

              Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

              3 days Bangalore to Mysore and Ooty Tour

              Mysore and Ooty

              Embark on a captivating three-day journey from Bangalore to Mysore and Ooty, immersing yourself in the rich history and scenic beauty of Southern India. Explore the majestic palaces and vibrant markets of Mysore, then venture into the picturesque landscapes of Ooty, where lush tea gardens and cascading waterfalls await. With comfortable accommodations included, this tour offers an unforgettable experience of culture, nature, and relaxation.

              Terms & Conditions Apply*

              Details
              From

              21000 ₹

              Choose Lishika Holidays

              Your Travel Expert

              Expert Travel Planning

              Tailored itineraries, seamless.

              Unparalleled Destination Knowledge

              Local insights, hidden gems.

              Personalised Customer Service

              Dedicated support, exceptional care.

              Exceptional Value Proposition

              Competitive prices, unbeatable deals.

              Trusted Travel Partnerships

              Reliable networks, renowned collaborators.

              Memorable Travel Experiences

              Unforgettable moments, lifelong memories.

              Call us for custom, group or a family package

              Our Packages

              Dzire (A/c)

              Etios (A/c)
              Innova (A/c)
              Tempo Traveller (Non A/c)
              Swaraj Mazda (Non A/c)
              Bus/Coach (Non A/c)
              Unlock unforgettable journeys with Lishika Holidays.

              Your Trusted Travel Partner

              At Lishika Holidays, we are passionate about crafting unforgettable travel experiences tailored to each individual's desires. With a commitment to excellence and a deep understanding of our destinations, we specialize in curating journeys that leave a lasting impression. Whether it's exploring hidden gems off the beaten path or indulging in luxury getaways, we strive to exceed expectations and create memories that will be cherished for a lifetime.

              MORE INFO
              Previous
              Next
              Crafted to suit your preferences and interests.

              Create cherished memories with family and friends, courtesy of Lishika Holidays.

              Enjoy seamless arrangements and stress-free travel.Receive dedicated support and attention to detail. Benefit from insider knowledge and local insights.

              • Tailored Experiences
              • Expert Guidance
              • Hassle-Free Planning
              • Exceptional Value
              • Personalised Service
              • Unforgettable Memories
              We strive to ensure

              At Lishika Holidays, client satisfaction is our ultimate destination!

              Unforgettable Travel Experiences

              Our customer's feedback is essential in building a great reputation and maintaining excellent service. By listening to our customer's needs, we can improve our offerings and provide an exceptional travel experience.

              "Our trip with Lishika Holidays was nothing short of amazing! From the seamless booking process to the well-planned itinerary, every aspect of our vacation was meticulously arranged. The accommodations were comfortable, the tour guides knowledgeable, and the overall experience unforgettable. We highly recommend Lishika Holidays to anyone looking for a hassle-free and memorable travel experience."
              - Rajesh and Priya
              "Lishika Holidays truly made our dream vacation a reality. The professionalism and attention to detail exhibited by their team surpassed our expectations. From exploring picturesque destinations to enjoying authentic local cuisine, every moment was crafted to perfection. We are grateful for the exceptional service and unforgettable memories created by Lishika Holidays. Can't wait for our next adventure with them!"
              - Ankit and Neha
